casebody.data:
CARTER-HUBBARD
v.
WRMC HOSPITAL. No. 411P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 11, 2006. John S. Willardson, Wilkesboro, for Carter-Hubbard Publishing.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of August 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of August 2006."
